name: Huntmaster
description:
The island of Arnbech has been coated in darkness. Most of the population is either dead, or in hiding. The last people to stand against the tides of evil are the Huntmasters, an order of warriors who have sworn to protect humanity from beasts, heretics, and the eldritch wrath.

You are Huntmaster X, a prodigy among the order, hand-picked by the Archivist, a mysterious figure who tends to the records of the Huntmasters. Your job is simple, go out, and kill beasts, death means you start it all over again. Nothing more to it.

So, out you go, to hunt for beasts, with your trusty pistol and saber in tow. Do your job, and do it well. After all, that's what this game is about. A long, arduous hunt.

Good luck.
